version_description: makromusic for Spotify is developing day by day. Follow the updates for the better makromusic experience.

- Explore page is redesigned.
- Home page is updated to Your Matches
- Block List added to settings page

- We add new features to share us in your social media accounts easily. Do not forget to tag us :)
- You can answer your app by switching
- By using "Shuffle Play" button in Explore, you can match instantly
- In chat page match popup will not disturb you anymore
- You can complain with detail text

According to your feedbacks, makromusic is improving day by day. For a better makromusic experience do not forget to update. Have fun!
- You can match by listening podcast!
- Performance improvement for better makromusic experience.
- You are noticed when you listen same song at the same time with already you matched.
- You can see your profile account details anymore.

- According to your feedbacks, makromusic is improving day by day. For a better makromusic experience do not forget to update. Have fun!
- On the chat page, you can now choose one of your recently listened or favorite music and share them with it!
- We want the makromusic experience to be at its best. We are now evaluating their reports much more comprehensively and effectively.
- Now you can easily access the Spotify profiles of the people you match. Remember that you can hide it from settings!
- We are aware of the glitches you experience on the premium purchase page. Now we have made purchasing much easier for you.
- We made extensive changes on the chat page. From now on, you will be able to see what your matches are currently listening to or recently listened to and like in the "Actions" section.
- We have also eliminated many errors you experienced while messaging.
- We've also introduced the feature to reply the message as you've always wanted!

- According to your feedbacks, makromusic is improving day by day. For a better makromusic experience do not forget to update. Have fun!
- On the chat page, you can now choose one of your recently listened or favorite music and share them with it!
- We want the makromusic experience to be at its best. We are now evaluating their reports much more comprehensively and effectively.
- Now you can easily access the Spotify profiles of the people you match. Remember that you can hide it from settings!
- We are aware of the glitches you experience on the premium purchase page. Now we have made purchasing much easier for you.
- We made extensive changes on the chat page. From now on, you will be able to see what your matches are currently listening to or recently listened to and like in the "Actions" section.
- We have also eliminated many errors you experienced while messaging.
- We've also introduced the feature to reply the message as you've always wanted!

- According to your feedbacks, makromusic is improving day by day. For a better makromusic experience do not forget to update. Have fun!
- We have made the registration steps much easier and more effective for our new users.
- We have completely redesigned the settings page for you! You will now be able to choose which notifications you want. For example, you may not want to be notified of incoming profile matches, then you can turn off this option in settings :) So it will be whatever you want.
- If you have more than a certain amount rate of matches in profile matches, the match design will now look more impressive. We don't want you to miss the high rate profile matches :)
- We fixed minor glitches on the chat page. Now you can have a better messaging experience!

According to your feedbacks, makromusic is improving day by day. For a better makromusic experience do not forget to update. Have fun!

Upon your feedbacks, we made some improvements on our Actions and Chat page!

Our emojis are much bigger now. You can now leave different expressions to the music you like in the movement. You can also answer quickly!
We have now made the expressions and messages from the movement more specific.

We've also done a lot of speed optimizations to improve the macromusic experience!

macromusic is getting better every day. Keep sharing their feedback with us! Your ideas are very valuable to us.

macromusic is getting better every day. Keep sharing their feedback with us! Your ideas are very valuable to us.

Upon feedbacks, we made innovations in Actions page and Instagram story sharing designs!

You can examine the sections we have prepared for you in a more comprehensive way.

We updated the designs on our social media posts. Now you can share your music taste with much more beautiful designs!

Now you can scroll infinite in actions page! You can review what your friends are listening to, leave an emoticon and send a message :)

We improved the delay in connecting at first login. You can now log in to makromusic much faster!

We've also done lots of speed optimizations to improve the macromusic experience!

makromusic is developing day by day. Keep sharing your feedback with us! Your ideas are very valuable to us.

We have been working on this update for about 3 months!

We made a lot of new features and optimizations upon your feedback.

What have we added in this version?
- You can share your music taste by making it fun with your photos.
- You can review the posts about the artists you love.
- Now you can share your makromusic link with your friends and see your common musical taste!
- You can log into your makromusic profile at www.makromusic.com!

Don't forget to update your makromusic for much more!
